data.description: Perl interfaces to Erlang's J-EAI server 1.0
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
After a month of test with Erlang's J-EAI server I think it might
    be the base for opensource EAI applications. In some areas it can
    substitute TIBCO, Sonic MQ and other products based on Java
    messaging. So I want to contribute some of the utilities that I have
    made for interfacing with it.
